Package com.paiondata.aristotle.mapper

Interface GraphMapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphMapperImpl
public interface GraphMapper
GraphMapper interface for mapping Graph objects.

  • Method Details

    • createGraph

      Graph createGraph(String title, String description, String userOidcid, String graphUuid, String relationUuid, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates a new graph with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the graph
      description - the description of the graph
      userOidcid - the OIDC ID of the user
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph
      relationUuid - the UUID of the link between the created node and the graph this node belongs to
      currentTime - the current time
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
      Returns:
      the created Graph object

    • getGraphsByOidcid

      List<Map<String,Object>> getGraphsByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves users' associated graphs by OIDC ID.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the OIDC ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of maps containing user information and associated graphs

    • updateGraphByUuid

      void updateGraphByUuid(String uuid, String title, String description, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates a graph by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      title - the new title of the graph
      description - the new description of the graph
      currentTime - the current time for update
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
